title: Frequently Asked Questions
subtitle: Common questions and answers about Smail temporary email service

whatIs.question: What is a temporary email?
whatIs.answer: A temporary email is a disposable email address used to receive emails without exposing your real email address. It's commonly used for website registration, downloading resources, or other scenarios requiring email verification.

howLong.question: How long can I use the email address?
howLong.answer: Each temporary email address is valid for 24 hours. After expiration, the email address will be deleted and cannot receive new emails.

isSafe.question: Is it safe to use temporary email?
isSafe.answer: Yes, temporary email is very safe. We don't store your personal information, and all emails are automatically deleted after 24 hours. We use modern encryption technology to protect data transmission.

howMany.question: How many email addresses can I create?
howMany.answer: You can create as many temporary email addresses as you need. Each address is independent and has its own 24-hour validity period.

canSend.question: Can I send emails?
canSend.answer: Currently, Smail only supports receiving emails, not sending them. This is to prevent spam and abuse.

attachments.question: Are attachments supported?
attachments.answer: Yes, we support receiving emails with attachments. You can view and download attachments directly on the webpage.

mobile.question: Is mobile device supported?
mobile.answer: Yes, Smail fully supports mobile devices. Our website uses responsive design and works perfectly on phones and tablets.

cost.question: Do I need to pay to use Smail?
cost.answer: No, Smail is completely free. We don't charge any fees and there are no hidden costs.

registration.question: Do I need to register an account?
registration.answer: No registration required. You can visit the website directly and start using the temporary email service immediately.

privacy.question: How is my privacy protected?
privacy.answer: We take user privacy very seriously. We don't collect or store your personal information, and all email data is automatically deleted after 24 hours. We don't share any data with third parties.
